SEARCH
Package seasofyore.core

Enum Class Direction

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Direction>
seasofyore.core.Direction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Direction>, Constable
public enum Direction extends Enum<Direction>
Represents the cardinal directions (NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST) used in the game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    EAST
    East direction, moving rightward with offsets (1, 0).
    NORTH
    North direction, moving upward with offsets (0, -1).
    SOUTH
    South direction, moving downward with offsets (0, 1).
    WEST
    West direction, moving leftward with offsets (-1, 0).

    • getRowColOffsets

      public int[] getRowColOffsets()
      Gets the row and column offsets for this direction as an array. Row corresponds to the y offset, and column corresponds to the x offset.
      Returns:
      an array containing the row and column offsets

    • fromOffsets

      public static Direction fromOffsets(int dx, int dy)
      Gets the Direction corresponding to the specified x and y offsets.
      Parameters:
      dx - the horizontal offset
      dy - the vertical offset
      Returns:
      the Direction matching the specified offsets
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no direction matches the offsets
